  proposition: Bang An et al. proposed a method for Automatic Pseudo-Harmful Prompt Generation to evaluate false refusals in Large Language Models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Bang An|PROPOSED|Automatic Pseudo-Harmful Prompt Generation
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Bang An|RESEARCHED|Large Language Models

  proposition: Paul Röttger et al. developed XSTest, a test suite for identifying exaggerated safety behaviors in Large Language Models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Paul Röttger|DEVELOPED|XSTest
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Paul Röttger|RESEARCHED|Large Language Models
    XSTest|TESTS|Large Language Models

  proposition: Min Zhang et al. revealed excessive sensitivity and calibration limitations of LLMs in implicit hate speech detection.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Min Zhang|RESEARCHED|Implicit Hate Speech Detection
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Min Zhang|RESEARCHED|Large Language Models

  proposition: Zouying Cao et al. proposed mitigating exaggerated safety in LLMs via safety-conscious activation steering.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Zouying Cao|PROPOSED|Safety-Conscious Activation Steering
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Zouying Cao|RESEARCHED|Large Language Models

  proposition: Chenyu Shi et al. investigated the overkill phenomenon in large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Chenyu Shi|INVESTIGATED|Overkill Phenomenon
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Chenyu Shi|RESEARCHED|Large Language Models

  proposition: Xirui Li et al. created Mossbench to test if multimodal language models are oversensitive to safe queries.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Xirui Li|CREATED|Mossbench
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Xirui Li|RESEARCHED|Large Language Models
    Mossbench|TESTS|Large Language Models

  proposition: Weixiang Zhao et al. researched comprehensive and efficient post-safety alignment of large language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Weixiang Zhao|RESEARCHED|Post-Safety Alignment
    
    entity-entity relationships:
    Weixiang Zhao|RESEARCHED|Large Language Models

  proposition: Chaofan Wang et al. explored safeguarding crowdsourcing surveys from ChatGPT with prompt injection.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Chaofan Wang|EXPLORED|Prompt Injection
